Articles.Content:
Hi there,

i have problems with modding, because each time for example b9 aerospace mod i download i only get a few parts. i can''t get anything more and it''s weird. i looked up tons of vids but it wont work. please help me out.
Install it exactly as the readme tells you, start a new save game in sandbox mode, check out the part list.

Hi, i am having issues with the ksp mods. because if i download b9 aerospace pack it does not want to give me all the mods. for example i don''t get firespitter.

install process:

Open zip mod- open game data mod - copy files - open ksp gamedata - paste mod files

please help me

Install it exactly as the readme tells you, start a new save game in sandbox mode, check out the part list.

Sorry but it still does not work. this is my installing process: Download > open zip > open gamedata mod > copy mod files > open ksp gamedata > paste modfiles > open ksp

I'm unclear on a couple of thing about your post. Are you expecting to see the Firespitter parts after installing B9? It only includes the plugin, but you can download the Firespitter parts from that thread.

It would also help to see a screenshot of the unzipped B9 download and your GameData folder after you install.
Then you need to follow the instructions in the READ FIRST sticky. Because clearly something's breaking...
Also, merged the threads. Please don't post duplicate threads
